query.comment: Jitter of delay for each result

query.formula: simulate[<=5000000;1] {coverage_percentage, delay_avg, error_prob, mean_abs_error, mean_relative_error, mean_squared_error, avg_flips_per_res, worst_case_error, worst_case_relative_error, max_hamming_distance, max_bit_flips, worst_delay }
